scene_description_enriched: A man and a woman are depicted riding a single horse. The woman, on the left, wears a long, flowing yellow gown and has her hair uncovered. The man, on the right, is dressed in a red tunic and hose, and wears a pink hat. He holds a bouquet of white flowers. They are riding through an outdoor setting with greenery and trees visible in the background. To the right, a stone archway suggests the presence of a building.
